mapper.update: update basic_schoolclass set unitid = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classcode = #{classcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stageid = #{stageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gradeid = #{gradeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, schoolsystem = #{schoolsystem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, schoolyear = #{schoolyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, teacherid = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, unitid, `name`, sortnum, `type`, classcode, stageid, gradeid, schoolsystem, schoolyear, createtime, teacherid from basic_schoolclass where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, unitid, `name`, sortnum, `type`, classcode, stageid, gradeid, schoolsystem, schoolyear, createtime, teacherid from basic_schoolclass
select pkid, unitid, `name`, sortnum, `type`, classcode, stageid, gradeid, schoolsystem, schoolyear, createtime, teacherid from basic_schoolclass WHERE unitid=#{0} and stageid=#{1} and gradeid=#{2}
select pkid, unitid, `name`, sortnum, `type`, classcode, stageid, gradeid, schoolsystem, schoolyear, createtime, teacherid from basic_schoolclass WHERE unitid=#{0} and classcode=#{1} limit 1

select pkid, unitid, `name`, sortnum, `type`, classcode, stageid, gradeid, schoolsystem, schoolyear, createtime, teacherid from basic_schoolclass WHERE unitid=#{0} and stageid=#{1} and gradeid=#{2} and `name`=#{3} limit 1
